about_the_game:
20+ cars


Choose from wide variety of vehicles

Custom vehicle physics


Custom powertrain from engine simulation to custom suspension and custom tire physics based on realistic model

Vehicle tuning

Adjust engine power, suspension, rim wise, tire friction, tire width, tire profile and more




or choose on of the stock presets for quick tuning

Advanced Livery System

Create beautiful liveries using the build it resources. Save it to preset and share with friends or use one of the provided stock presets.

Creating a livery on YouTube :

Weather system with day/night cycle


Pick a day, night or any other time with 24 hours cycle. Animated time with time speed.
Pick up sunny, foggy, cloudy, rainy or stormy weather

Controller Support and Steering Wheel for playing


Working with many Steering Wheel sets. Presets for Logitech and Thrustmaster wheels.

Different game modes


  • Free Drift - Mode with no time limit. Complete the target list and get a cash reward. Reset and do it again.
  • Just Drift - Freely drift around, No time limit and no scoring. Great for practicing or just having fun.=
  • Challenges - Time based events where you'll have to do your best to win by completing a target list
  • Time Attack - Complete some racing track in time and get a cash reward
  • Career Mode - Become a PRO drifter and win the PRO Drifter Badge. Complete the total of 30 Drift Challenges (3 tiers, 10 events each) and get on the top of the Leaderboard of professionals
  • Open World - Slide in the island, the city or between them, avoid traffic or practice on the available tracks
  • Online Multiplayer - Play with friends and other players

Driver Badges


Complete Career Mode to get the Pro Drifter Badge
Complete Career Mode and reach max driver level 100 to get the Ultimate Drifter Badge

name: The Drift Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6xxx or AMD Ryzen 3 3xxx
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GeForce GTX 950 2GB / Radeon AMD R9 270 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 10.0
  • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs are not guaranteed to work
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9xxx @ 3.6GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3xxx
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 10.0
  • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs are not guaranteed to work

short_description: Slide your ride in different game modes. Earn XP points and complete challenges to level up and unlock cars or drift with friends in the Online Multiplayer mode.
